title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) OF VARIOUS OFFICES FOR FY 2025 CHARGEABLE AGAINST THE PERSONAL SERVICES SAVINGS, MAINTENANCE AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSE (MOOE) SAVINGS, GRANT FROM THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT AND THE 5% MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT FUND (MDRRMF). Author CouncilopMiko C. Pelegrina
